0.0.1.name: wordpress/widget-control
0.0.1.description: Widget Control is a plugin which aims to add more advanced control over your Widgets. At the moment the only feature it has is the ability to disable all Widgets at the same time. I hope to get some time and ideas to add more features in the future.<br/> <br/> I've only tested the plugin with WP 2.7.0 and 2.7.1, but it will probobly work in older version as well. Let me know!<br/> <br/> Contact me for requests or bug reports! :)
